forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
Under the early morning sky of Downtown San Francisco, a subtle dance of sunshine and clouds unfolds. The city basks in a gentle warmth, with the promise of a mostly sunny day ahead, while the cool caress of a light west southwest breeze adds a refreshing touch. As the hours unfold, temperatures will dip modestly from their current embrace of sixty-four, settling into the comfortable low sixties by afternoon. 

Yet, like a whispering secret from the sea, there lingers a slight chance of drizzle towards day’s end, a reminder of the ever-watchful marine layer hovering nearby. Tonight, clouds will wrap the skyline in a soft, muted embrace, with a low around fifty-four inviting you to dress in layers—consider a light sweater and jacket for the evening stroll. For those seeking mundane pleasures amidst the city’s rhythm, a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment at one of the park benches with a book might be just the invitation needed to enjoy this delightful yet understated day.
